short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that highlights submissions and comments by your favorite users on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your favorite users on Hacker News website and have all their submissions and comments highlighted, so you won't miss anything they have to say ever again.
